title: Bug 114903: Default values missing in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing a report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the Enter Parameters dialog is displayed. In this dialog, all parameter values are empty, which is not the expected behavior.
EB: I expected to see the default values of the parameters shown in the value box of the Enter Parameters dialog. This would allow me to modify only the parameter I want to change, without having to input all values again.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Preview a report. 
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button. 
3. Observe that the Enter Parameters dialog appears with all values empty. 
4. Attempt to modify a parameter and realize that you have to input all values instead of seeing the default values pre-filled.
